General.Name: Gs Retail
General.Description: GS Retail Co., Ltd. engages in retailing business in South Korea. It operates convenience stores under the brand name of GS25; supermarkets under the GS Supermarket brand name; health and beauty stores under the Watsons brand name; and operates hotel under the Parnas brand name. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. GS Retail Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of GS Holdings Corp.
General.Address: GS Tower, 508, Nonhyeon-ro, Seoul, South Korea, 06141
